Package package1

Class Project

java.lang.Object
package1.Project
public class Project extends Object
A class that represents a project. A project has a unique project ID, a supervisor, a title, a status, and a student. A project can be in one of the following statuses: AVAILABLE, RESERVED, UNAVAILABLE, ALLOCATED.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Project(Supervisor supervisor, String projectTitle)
    Constructs a new Project object with a unique project ID, supervisor, project title, and sets the project status to AVAILABLE.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(Supervisor supervisor, String projectTitle)
      Constructs a new Project object with a unique project ID, supervisor, project title, and sets the project status to AVAILABLE. Also adds the project to the project list and adds the project to the supervisor's list of projects.
      Parameters:
      supervisor - the supervisor assigned to this project
      projectTitle - the title of the project

  • Method Details

    • getProjectID

      public int getProjectID()
      Returns the unique project ID of this project.
      Returns:
      the unique project ID of this project

    • changeProjectID

      public int changeProjectID(int projectID)
      Changes the project ID of this project to the specified value. If the specified value is less than 0, the project ID is not changed.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the new project ID
      Returns:
      1 if the project ID was changed successfully, 0 otherwise

    • getSupervisor

      public Supervisor getSupervisor()
      Returns the supervisor assigned to this project.
      Returns:
      the supervisor assigned to this project

    • changeSupervisor

      public int changeSupervisor(Supervisor supervisor)
      Changes the supervisor assigned to this project to the specified supervisor. If the specified supervisor is null, the supervisor is not changed.
      Parameters:
      supervisor - the new supervisor assigned to this project
      Returns:
      1 if the supervisor was changed successfully, 0 otherwise

    • getProjectTitle

      public String getProjectTitle()
      Returns the title of this project.
      Returns:
      the title of this project

    • changeProjectTitle

      public int changeProjectTitle(String projectTitle)
      Changes the title of this project to the specified title. If the specified title is null or an empty string, the project title is not changed.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - the new title of this project
      Returns:
      1 if the project title was changed successfully, 0 otherwise

      Parameters:
      projectStatus - the new status of this project
      Returns:
      1 if the project status was changed successfully, 0 otherwise

    • doesProjectBelongToSupervisor

      public boolean doesProjectBelongToSupervisor(int projectID)
      Checks if the project with the specified project ID belongs to the supervisor of this project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the project ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the project with the specified project ID belongs to the supervisor of this project, false otherwise

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent()
      Returns the student assigned to this project.
      Returns:
      the student assigned to this project

    • changeStudent

      public int changeStudent(Student student)
      Assigns the specified student to this project. If the specified student is null, the student is not assigned to the project.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to assign to this project
      Returns:
      1 if the student was assigned to the project successfully, 0 otherwise

    • removeStudent

      public int removeStudent()
      Removes the student assigned to this project.
      Returns:
      1 if the student was removed from the project successfully

    • displayProject

      public void displayProject()
      Displays the details of this project on the console, including its ID, supervisor, title, status, and, if allocated, student. If an error occurs while displaying the project, a message is printed on the console indicating that an error occurred.

    • displayAllProjects

      public static void displayAllProjects()
      Displays information for all projects in the project list.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while displaying the projects.

    • displayAvailableProjects

      public static void displayAvailableProjects()
      Displays information for all available projects in the project list.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while displaying the available projects.

    • getProjectByID

      public static Project getProjectByID(int projectID)
      Retrieves a project from the project list by project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the project with the specified ID, or null if the project was not found.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the project.

    • getProjectByStatus

      public static List<Project> getProjectByStatus(ProjectStatus projectStatus)
      Retrieves a list of projects from the project list by project status.
      Parameters:
      projectStatus - the status of the projects to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a list of projects with the specified status, or null if no projects were found.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while retrieving the projects.

    • getProjectBySupervisor

      public static List<Project> getProjectBySupervisor(String supervisorID)
      Returns a list of projects supervised by the given supervisor.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor to search for
      Returns:
      a list of projects supervised by the given supervisor, or null if an error occurred

      public static int addInitialProjects(List<Project> initialProjectList)

      Returns:
      1 if the addition was successful, 0 otherwise

    • assignProjectList

      public static int assignProjectList(List<Project> retrievedProjectList)
      Assigns a retrieved list of projects to the current project list.
      Parameters:
      retrievedProjectList - a list of projects retrieved from a data source
      Returns:
      an integer indicating the success or failure of the operation. 1 means success, 0 means failure.

    • addToProjectList

      public static int addToProjectList(Project project)
      Adds a project to the project list if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to add
      Returns:
      1 if the addition was successful, 0 if the project already exists or an error occurred

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      1 if the removal was successful, 0 otherwise

    • massModifyProjectStatus

      public static int massModifyProjectStatus(String supervisorID, ProjectStatus projectStatus)
      Modifies the status of all projects supervised by the given supervisor, except for projects with status "ALLOCATED".
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - the ID of the supervisor whose projects' status are to be modified
      projectStatus - the new status to set for the projects
      Returns:
      1 if the modification was successful, 0 otherwise

      Parameters:
      obj - the object to check
      Returns:
      true if the object is an instance of the Project class, false otherwise
